scripts.build:demo: nx build demo && cd dist/demo && zip -r -D dhis2-ui-demo.zip .
scripts.pack:ng-dhis2-ui: npm run build:ng-dhis2-ui && cd dist/packages/ng-dhis2-ui && npm pack
scripts.link:ng-dhis2-ui: npm run build:ng-dhis2-ui && cd dist/packages/ng-dhis2-ui && npm link
scripts.publish-local:ng-dhis2-ui: npm run build:ng-dhis2-ui && cd dist/packages/ng-dhis2-ui && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873/
scripts.publish:ng-dhis2-ui: npm run build:ng-dhis2-ui && cd dist/packages/ng-dhis2-ui && npm publish --access public
